mapper.select: select p.MKT_PRODUCT_ID AS mktProductId, PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice, PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, PRODUCT_IMG AS productImg from study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT p left join study_gh.MKT_ORDER o on p.MKT_PRODUCT_ID = o.PRODUCT_ID and ORDER_CONFIRM = 'Y' group by MKT_PRODUCT_ID order by count(PRODUCT_ID), MKT_PRODUCT_ID desc limit 8

select MKT_PRODUCT_ID AS mktProductId, PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice, PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, PRODUCT_IMG AS productImg, count(PRODUCT_ID) from study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT p left join study_gh.MKT_ORDER o on p.MKT_PRODUCT_ID = o.PRODUCT_ID and ORDER_CONFIRM = 'Y' group by MKT_PRODUCT_ID order by count(PRODUCT_ID), MKT_PRODUCT_ID desc LIMIT #{startRowNo}, #{endRowNo}
select COUNT(MKT_PRODUCT_ID) from study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT p
select p.MKT_PRODUCT_ID AS mktProductId, PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice, PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, PRODUCT_IMG AS productImg from study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT p
select CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId, CATEGORY_IMG AS categoryImg, CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName from study_gh.MKT_CATEGORY c

select p.MKT_PRODUCT_ID AS mktProductId, PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice, PRODUCT_QUANTITY AS productQuantity, PRODUCT_CATEGORY AS productCategory, PRODUCT_EXPLAIN AS productExplain, PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, PRODUCT_IMG AS productImg from study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT p, (select PRODUCT_ID from study_gh.MKT_ORDER where ORDER_CONFIRM = 'Y' group by PRODUCT_ID order by COUNT(PRODUCT_ID) desc) o where p.MKT_PRODUCT_ID = o.PRODUCT_ID limit #{start}, #{end}

select MKT_PRODUCT_ID AS mktProductId, PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice, PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, PRODUCT_IMG AS productImg, count(PRODUCT_ID) from study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT p left join study_gh.MKT_ORDER o on p.MKT_PRODUCT_ID = o.PRODUCT_ID and ORDER_CONFIRM = 'Y' where PRODUCT_CATEGORY = #{categoryId} group by MKT_PRODUCT_ID order by count(PRODUCT_ID) desc LIMIT #{startRowNo}, #{endRowNo}

select MKT_PRODUCT_ID AS mktProductId, PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice, PRODUCT_QUANTITY AS productQuantity, PRODUCT_CATEGORY AS productCategory, PRODUCT_EXPLAIN AS productExplain, PRODUCT_NAME AS productName from study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT p where p.PRODUCT_CATEGORY=#{code} order by p.CREATE_DT desc limit 8
select MKT_PRODUCT_ID AS mktProductId, PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice, PRODUCT_IMG AS productImg from study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT where MKT_PRODUCT_ID=#{productId}

select MKT_PRODUCT_ID AS mktProductId, PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice, PRODUCT_IMG AS productImg from study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT p, study_gh.MKT_RECENT_PRODUCT m where p.MKT_PRODUCT_ID = m.PRODUCT_ID and m.MEM_ID = #{memId} order by m.UPDATE_DT desc limit 10

select PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice, MKT_PRODUCT_OPTION_ID AS productOptionId, OPTION1 AS option1, OPTION1_DATA AS option1Data, CODE_NAME('OPK',OPTION1) AS option1Name, MKT_OPTION_NAME(PRODUCT_ID,OPTION1,OPTION1_DATA) AS option1DataName, OPTION2 AS option2, OPTION2_DATA AS option2Data, CODE_NAME('OPK',OPTION2) AS option2Name, MKT_OPTION_NAME(PRODUCT_ID,OPTION2,OPTION2_DATA) AS option2DataName, OPTION_QUANTITY AS productQuantity from study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT_OPTION where PRODUCT_ID=#{productId}
select SET_ID AS setId, DETAIL_EXPLAIN AS detailExplain, IMG_ID AS detailImg from study_gh.MKT_DETAIL_PAGE where PRODUCT_ID=#{productId}

select PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, PRODUCT_IMG AS productImg, PRODUCT_ID AS productId, PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice from study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT p, (select PRODUCT_ID from study_gh.MKT_ORDER where ORDER_CONFIRM = 'Y' group by PRODUCT_ID order by COUNT(PRODUCT_ID) desc) o where p.PRODUCT_CATEGORY = #{categoryId} and p.MKT_PRODUCT_ID = o.PRODUCT_ID limit 4

select r.MKT_REVIEW_ID AS mktReviewId, MY_STAR AS myStar, REVIEW_STRING AS reviewString, r.CREATE_DT AS reviewDate, r.MEM_ID AS memId, p.PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, m.NICKNAME AS nickname, p.PRODUCT_IMG AS productImg, r.PRO_REVIEW_IMG AS proReviewImg, MKT_OPTION_NAME(mpo.PRODUCT_ID, mpo.OPTION2, mpo.OPTION2_DATA) AS option2DataName, MKT_OPTION_NAME(mpo.PRODUCT_ID, mpo.OPTION1, mpo.OPTION1_DATA) AS option1DataName from study_gh.MKT_REVIEW r, study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT p, study_gh.MEMBER m, study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT_OPTION mpo where r.PRODUCT_ID=#{productId} and p.MKT_PRODUCT_ID= #{productId} and mpo.MKT_PRODUCT_OPTION_ID = r.OPTION_ID and r.MEM_ID = m.MEM_ID limit #{startRowNo}, #{endRowNo}
mapper.insert: insert into study_gh.MKT_CART ( MKT_CART_ID, MEM_ID, PRODUCT_ID, PRICE, CART_QUANT, PODUCT_OPTION ) VALUES ( #{mktCartId}, #{memId}, #{mktProductId}, #{productPrice}, #{orderQuantity}, #{productOptionId} )
mapper.select: select mkt_cart_id AS cartId, product_id AS mktProductId, p.PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, p.PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice, cart_quant AS productSelectedQuantity, p.PRODUCT_IMG AS productImg, poduct_option AS productOptionId, price AS totalPrice from study_gh.MKT_CART c, study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT p where c.MEM_ID = #{memId} and p.MKT_PRODUCT_ID = c.PRODUCT_ID and c.USE_YN='N'

select c.product_id AS mktProductId, p.PRODUCT_PRICE AS productPrice, c.cart_quant AS productSelectedQuantity, c.poduct_option AS productOptionId, c.price AS totalPrice from study_gh.MKT_CART c, study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT p where c.MKT_CART_ID = #{id} and p.MKT_PRODUCT_ID = c.PRODUCT_ID and c.USE_YN='N'
mapper.insert: insert into study_gh.MKT_ORDER ( order_id, mem_id, product_id, option_id, order_price, order_quantity, ORDER_DELIVERY_PAY ) VALUES ( #{orderItemId}, #{memId}, #{mktProductId}, #{productOptionId}, #{productPrice}, #{productSelectedQuantity}, #{deliveryPay} )

insert into study_gh.MKT_MY_ORDER ( my_order_id, order_item_id, mem_id
) VALUES ( #{myOderId}, #{orderItemId}, #{memId} )
insert into study_gh.MKT_RECENT_PRODUCT ( MKT_RECENT_PRODUCT_ID, MEM_ID, PRODUCT_ID ) VALUES ( #{mktRecentProductId}, #{memId}, #{productId} )
mapper.select: select ADD_NAME AS addName, PHONE_NUMBER AS phoneNumber, ADD_ZIP AS addZip, ADDRESS AS address, ADD_DETAIL AS addDetail from study_gh.MKT_ADDRESS a where a.MEM_ID = #{memId}

SELECT MP.MKT_PRODUCT_ID productId , MPO.MKT_PRODUCT_OPTION_ID productOptionId , MP.PRODUCT_EXPLAIN productExplain , 'deker' productBrand , MP.PRODUCT_IMG productImg , OPTION1 option1 , OPTION1_DATA option1Data , CODE_NAME('OPK',MPO.OPTION1) option1Nm , MKT_OPTION_NAME(MPO.PRODUCT_ID,MPO.OPTION1,MPO.OPTION1_DATA) option1DataNm , OPTION2 option2 , OPTION2_DATA option2Data , CODE_NAME('OPK',MPO.OPTION2) option2Nm , MKT_OPTION_NAME(MPO.PRODUCT_ID,MPO.OPTION2,MPO.OPTION2_DATA) option2DataNm , MO.DELIVERY_CODE deliveryCode , CODE_NAME('TTC',MO.DELIVERY_CODE) deliveryName , MA.ADD_NAME addNmae , MA.ADD_ZIP addZip , CONCAT(MA.ADDRESS,' ',MA.ADD_DETAIL) address , MO.WAYBILL waybill FROM study_gh.MKT_ORDER MO LEFT OUTER JOIN study_gh.MKT_ADDRESS MA ON MO.ADD_ID = MA.ADD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT_OPTION MPO on MO.OPTION_ID = MPO.MKT_PRODUCT_OPTION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT MP on MO.PRODUCT_ID = MP.MKT_PRODUCT_ID WHERE MO.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
SELECT CODE_NM levelNm FROM study_gh.CODE_DETAIL WHERE CODE_ID='ODS' AND CODE=#{level}
SELECT WAYBILL AS waybill, DELIVERY_CODE AS deliveryCode, ORDER_ID AS orderId FROM study_gh.MKT_ORDER WHERE ORDER_STATE in (1, 2, 3, 4, 5) and ORDER_CONFIRM = 'N'
SELECT ORDER_STATE orderState , COUNT(ORDER_STATE) orderStateCount FROM study_gh.MKT_ORDER WHERE 1=1 AND MEM_ID = #{memId} AND USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY ORDER_STATE

SELECT MP.MKT_PRODUCT_ID productId , MO.ORDER_ID orderId , MP.PRODUCT_IMG productImg , 'deker' productBrand , MP.PRODUCT_NAME productName , OPTION1 option1 , OPTION1_DATA option1Data , CODE_NAME('OPK',MPO.OPTION1) option1Nm , MKT_OPTION_NAME(MPO.PRODUCT_ID,MPO.OPTION1,MPO.OPTION1_DATA) option1DataNm , OPTION2 option2 , OPTION2_DATA option2Data , CODE_NAME('OPK',MPO.OPTION2) option2Nm , MKT_OPTION_NAME(MPO.PRODUCT_ID,MPO.OPTION2,MPO.OPTION2_DATA) option2DataNm , MO.CREATE_DT createDt , MO.ORDER_STATE orderState , CODE_NAME('ODS',MO.ORDER_STATE) orderStateNm , MO.ORDER_PRICE orderPrice , MO.ORDER_QUANTITY orderQuantity FROM study_gh.MKT_ORDER MO LEFT OUTER JOIN MKT_PRODUCT MP on MO.PRODUCT_ID = MP.MKT_PRODUCT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT_OPTION MPO on MO.OPTION_ID = MPO.MKT_PRODUCT_OPTION_ID WHERE 1=1 AND MO.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MO.CREATE_DT > #{period} AND MO.ORDER_STATE = #{deliveryState} LIMIT #{startRowNo}, #{endRowNo}
SELECT COMPLETED_DT AS timeString, ORDER_ID AS id FROM study_gh.MKT_ORDER WHERE ORDER_STATE = 6 and ORDER_CONFIRM = 'N'
mapper.insert: insert into study_gh.MKT_REVIEW ( MKT_REVIEW_ID, MEM_ID, PRODUCT_ID, IMG_ID, MY_STAR, REVIEW_STRING, PRO_REVIEW_IMG, ORDER_ID, OPTION_ID ) VALUES ( #{mktReviewId}, #{memId}, #{productId}, ( SELECT IMG_ID FROM study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT WHERE MKT_PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}), #{myStar}, #{reviewString}, #{proReviewImg}, #{orderId}, ( SELECT OPTION_ID FROM study_gh.MKT_ORDER WHERE MKT_ORDER.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}) )
mapper.select: select MKT_PRODUCT_ID AS mktProductId, PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, PRODUCT_IMG AS productImg, 'deker' AS productBrand from study_gh.MKT_PRODUCT where PRODUCT_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') or PRODUCT_EXPLAIN like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT ADD_ID addId , ADD_NICKNAME addNickname , ADD_ZIP addZip , ADDRESS address , ADD_DETAIL addDetail , ADD_NAME addName , PHONE_NUMBER phoneNumber , ADD_MAIN addMain FROM study_gh.MKT_ADDRESS WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND ADD_DEFAULT = 'Y'
